Package renderer

Class Render.Pixel

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render.Pixel
Enclosing class:
Render
private class Render.Pixel
extends java.lang.Object
Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of. It is used for multithreading in the Renderer and for follow up its progress.
There is a main follow up object and several secondary objects - one in each thread.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private int nextP​(Render.Pixel target)
    Internal function for thread-safe manipulating of main follow up Pixel object - this function is critical section for all the threads, and main Pixel object data is the shared data of this critical section.
    The function provides next pixel number each call.
    boolean nextPixel​(Render.Pixel target)
    Public function for getting next pixel number into secondary Pixel object.
    void print()
    Debug print of progress percentage - must be run from the main thread

  • Constructor Details

    • Pixel

      public Pixel​(int maxRows, int maxCols)
      The constructor for initializing the main follow up Pixel object
      Parameters:
      maxRows - the amount of pixel rows
      maxCols - the amount of pixel columns

    • Pixel

      public Pixel()
      Default constructor for secondary Pixel objects

  • Method Details

    • nextP

      private int nextP​(Render.Pixel target)
      Internal function for thread-safe manipulating of main follow up Pixel object - this function is critical section for all the threads, and main Pixel object data is the shared data of this critical section.
      The function provides next pixel number each call.
      Parameters:
      target - target secondary Pixel object to copy the row/column of the next pixel
      Returns:
      the progress percentage for follow up: if it is 0 - nothing to print, if it is -1 - the task is finished, any other value - the progress percentage (only when it changes)

    • nextPixel

      public boolean nextPixel​(Render.Pixel target)
      Public function for getting next pixel number into secondary Pixel object. The function prints also progress percentage in the console window.
      Parameters:
      target - target secondary Pixel object to copy the row/column of the next pixel
      Returns:
      true if the work still in progress, -1 if it's done

    • print

      public void print()
      Debug print of progress percentage - must be run from the main thread
